By tapping %1$sContinue%1$s above, you are adding this email to your Digits account. You agree that this app and %7$sall apps listed in your Digits account%5$s can access this email address and their users can discover you by email.

By tapping %1$sSend confirmation code%1$s above, %6$sDigits by Twitter%5$s will send you an SMS to confirm your phone number. On the next screen, you can choose “Resend code” to receive a new SMS or “Call me” to initiate a phone call to confirm your phone number. Message, call & data rates may apply.
By tapping %1$sCall me%1$s above, %6$sDigits by Twitter%5$s will send you a voice call to confirm your phone number. Call & data rates may apply.

By tapping %1$sCreate account%1$s above, you agree to the %8$sTerms of Service%5$s, %9$sPrivacy Policy%5$s, and %10$sCookies Use%5$s of %6$sDigits by Twitter%5$s, to share your phone number with %4$s, and that other users of %4$s can discover you by phone number.
By tapping %1$sContinue%1$s above, your %7$sDigits phone number and/or email address%5$s will be shared with %4$s and other users of %4$s can discover you by phone number and/or email.

"1. Choose a camp, then choose your hero. Heroes have different abilities that create great synergies in your team that devastates your enemies. 2. You spawn in your own Fortress and aims to breach enemies' defenses and ultimately their Fortress Core. 3. You will face fierce oppositions along the way and strong Fortress Barriers will stand in your way. 4. Regroup and defend your base if it's under attack. 5. If you destroy the enemies' Dark Orb in the map, your team will gain strong buffs. 6. Cooperation is the key to victory—never fight alone! 7. There is a 15 seconds respawn timer whenever you have been defeated. 8. If you are disconnected from the game server during a game, hurry up and re-enter the game lobby, as you still have a chance to continue fighting for your camp. 9. Summon your hero and start conquering with your friends!"
Add new friends by name & ID

The coin is the currency in circulation in multiplayer master. It can be used to purchase goods and services in Multiplayer Master.
The exchange rate between coins and US dollars is $US1 = 100 coins. That is, a coin is worth an American penny.
Currently, Multiplayer Master only supports topping up via Google Play.

1.Enter the game. Click Join and enter the server to line up.

"2.Get ready. You will be transferred to the lobby map. You can wait for other players here. There are lots of chests in this village which contain many valuable items, but you couldn't take them into the game map."
"3.Flying. You will be transferred to a platform in the sky. This platform will disappear in 10s. But don't worry, you have elytra and you can use jump button to glide."

4.Start. You need to explore the map after landing. Chests in the map contain guns, armors and potions that you can take to arm yourself. The safe area will shrink gradually, you need to get to the safe area before the circle starts shrinking (the red circle in the mini map).
You install version of the game is not official.

"As one of the many youthful members of an assassin's family, the family trial is the ultimate way to determine whether you will be recognized as an official assassin. Every competitor must compete against one another, and you will only be declared the final winner if you have defeated the highest number of rivals. Your assassin's equipment will give you the greatest advantage!"
"Use your Gold immediately to maximize your armor and equipment. Do you wish to have more Gold? Exchange them with the body count of your slain enemies!"
"<font color=#f6cc10>Shopkeeper:</font> Got killed? Don't worry, you can use your equipment to make up for it. Look through the box and see if there is anything useful!"
You can randomly get normal items or equipment
Not enough Gold. Go kill more enemies!
You have successfully purchased the items and they have been automatically equipped on you. Please view the items column.
Needs more than 4 players to start the game
Other players are joining, please wait…
Not enough coins :( Go get more now!
For a team battle among 4-10 players

"1. The Assassins' Infighting is a fighting game in which players can purchase equipment. Players need to kill as many other players as possible within the time limit. The player who reaches the target number of kills first wins. 2. When the server host creates an The Assassins' Infighting server, he can set the number of players in the server, whether nicknames are visible, and the target number of kills while downloading the map assigned by The Assassins' Infighting. 3. After the server is created, players may enter the server. After the server is full, the server host taps the Start button to begin. Each game lasts 5 minutes. 4. After the game begins, each player will first see the background introduction interface and the equipment store interface. Before the 30-second countdown timer lapses, players need to purchase suitable equipment or tools using pre-held Gold. After the countdown timer lapses, the battle begins. 5. During the course of the battle, killing another player counts as 1 kill. The player who made the kill receives reward money. Accidental deaths such as death by falling, poison, or fire counts as 1 death."
"Tap here! Taste a new game mode: Battle"

This is adapted from the film The Hunger Games, 24 players must kill all their opponents. Players collect items that are located in different parts of the map and the last one standing becomes the winner.
Your Slimes will drop extra Bows and Arrows
Your Slimes will drop extra Diamond Swords.
You will start the game with a Stone Axe.
You will start the game with a Chain Kit.
Special effect for server joining. Name highlighted.
No need to wait in long lines, you will always be the first in the line!

"Dear Master, how do you feel about Multiplayer Master? Give me a 5-star if you like it pleasssse!~~"
5.How can I get the Upgrade Offers of VIP?

"Rules: •If you have more than 30 days of VIP1 access left, you may choose to pay US$4/month to upgrade. • If you has M months and N days of access left, you may pay the difference by paying $US4/month to upgrade to a VIP2 account (the number of months where payment can be made shall be less than M). After you pay the difference, the VIP2 account immediately becomes active. After the VIP2 account expires, you will continue to have access to any remaining VIP1 services. For example, if you has 3 months and 20 days of access to VIP1 services and pays $US 8 to make up the difference to buy VIP2 services, you will have 2 months of access to VIP2 services. After the VIP2 account expires, you will still have 1 month and 20 days of access to VIP1 services. • If you has less than 30 VIP1 days, you cannot take advantage of the offer to make up the difference and pay US$4/month to upgrade. You must start a VIP2 account at a price of US$5.99/month. • Upgrading and offers for paying the difference are only available to VIP1 members."
Sorry! All the privileges shown today have been collected already. You can also buy it directly!
Congratulations on receiving your temporary privilege! You will be able to create a server of %s for free. Go now?
"He is a Master (VIP user), you can't kick him out."

"You can't kick him out in 5 mins unless you are VIP Master."

1. Enter the game. Click Join button and wait for your teammates. The game will be started automatically when there are enough players in the server.
2. Get ready for the game. The game will be started in 10 seconds after all players were in. Your born and spawn points will be on this bed which you need to protect.

3. Grab your tools. There are tools in this shop that you will need. You can take weapons and arm yourself, take grass block to pave paths and take cobblestones to fortify your bed. All items in the chests will automatically increase in quantity at regular intervals.
"4. Paving. You will need to pave a path to your enemies' base and you will also be able to find many more useful resources in your way. The best weapons are located in the middle island!"
"5. Achieve victory. When you arrived your enemies' base, slain them all with your weapons and destroy their beds to win!"

"With the Sky War elements, this Bed War is different from the traditional Bed War. To achieve victory, you will need to pave paths to your enemies' base and destroy their beds. Along the way there will be chests with increasing number of tools inside. Grab your weapons, take the chests and destroy the beds of your enemies! Good luck!"
Server maintenance is in process. Please wait.
Your Minecraft version does not support the Battle, please download right version to join: [1.1.0.55]、[1.1.0.8]、[1.1.0.9].
The item has been assigned to your backpack. You can go check now.
The item has been assigned to your backpack. You can go check now.
M-tickets can be used to purchase various products.
They can be obtained by watching videos and completing tasks

"1. M-tickets are the currency used to purchase products within Multiplayer Master. You can obtain M-tickets by watching videos or completing tasks.
2. After collecting sufficient M-tickets, you can select the M-tickets option to purchase products in the purchase area, such as to unlock premium resources.
3. M-tickets are tied to your account and cannot be exchanged for coins.
4. The gift of M-tickets given to new users upon registration can only be given once per account and per mobile phone. Users cannot participate more than once.
5. Because of regional or network reasons, you may be unable to properly watch videos; if this happens, please try again a short while later. Because of restrictions by the advertiser, successfully viewing advertisements multiple times may result in you being unable to watch that day; if this happens, please try again the next day.
6. Because of regional or network reasons, your tasks may not be correctly retrieved; please try again a short while later."
You can use it to unlock:
Watch videos to get award quickly and steadily
1. Enter the game. Click Start and enter the server to line up, you can play and wait for you team mate at the same time.

2. Waiting time. After entering the Survival Game map, you will appear at the spawn point. You are not allowed to move yet, but you can see your competition and observe the environment around you while you wait for the game to start.

3. Get ready. Now you can start moving. Go to the center to destroy Slimes and take objects as fast as you can. You can also take this opportunity to find an advantageous place to stand. During this stage, players are not allowed to engage in battle.
4. Start. Now you get to battle it out with the other players. In other places of the map, new Slimes will appear and you can take more objects. You will have 7 minutes to fight the other players.
5. Battle. If after 7 minutes, there is still no winner, the remaining players are sent to an arena to fight. The game continues until only one player is left, who becomes the winner!
For a team battle among 2-10 players
